systemMaintenanceShutdown.title: Dear Valued Users,
systemMaintenanceShutdown.content: We are dedicated to enhancing the stability and efficiency of our services. To achieve this, we have scheduled a system maintenance that will take place from 21:00 to 23:00 Beijing Time. During this period, our services will be temporarily unavailable. For our users in Seattle, this maintenance corresponds to 05:00 to 07:00 AM local time, taking into account the current daylight saving time adjustments. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding and support.
